code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavingsGoals=()=>{const[goals,setGoals]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchGoals=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/savings-goals');setGoals(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching savings goals:",error);}};fetchGoals();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Savings Goals"}),goals.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:goals.map(goal=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Goal: ",goal.name,", Target: $",goal.targetAmount,", Progress: $",goal.progress]},goal.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No savings goals available."})]});};export default SavingsGoals;
